EmailTemplate.name: Pre-VMworld ParadisePack inhouse.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Complimentary Downloads: Drive Down the Cost of Virtualization Control
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Welcome to Virtualization paradise, where you can relax with the peace of mind that your workloads are being managed efficiently and your virtual data center is under control.
As you prepare for VMworld 2013—and even if you are not planning to attend-- we’re excited to offer you this complimentary ParadisePack <http://bit.ly/16xSxdh>, which contains the essentials for learning about a new approach to managing your virtual infrastructure that will allow you to ride the wave of datacenter control.
Best Regards,
VMTurbo Team Headed to VMworld 2013? Come see us at Booth #611 and check out our surf simulator
VMTurbo, named by EMA as a Vendor to Watch <http://bit.ly/13RljTL> in 2013
